website_summaries.verdict: Extremely durable baseball bat with sizes made for young players.
pros: Available in five different length/weight combinations that all have a -10 drop weight
Made more for youngsters ages 9 to 12 to receive a good performance
Construction features high-grade aluminum that's sure to last for multiple seasons
Comes from one of the most trusted names in baseball bats
cons: Not made for younger and smaller kids because of bat's weight

customer_reviews.title: 3oz heavier than advertised with terrible weight distribution.  See my Little League Baseball List for other bat options.
customer_reviews.text: This Easton S150 29 inch bat is not very good. It is the least expensive USA bat and it shows. The weight is very poorly distributed and as such, swing balance gets thrown off. It weighs significantly more (~3oz or ~100g) than it’s claimed 19oz too, which is a big difference when you consider that these bats are being used by small kids. The build seems solid, despite there being stickers on the barrel whose adhesive could not be removed, and the grip is nice, but this bat falls short of expectations, even when judging this against other lower end USA bats. I decided to return this bat. See my Little League Baseball List for bat options.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great size, hold. I use for protection🤗
customer_reviews.text: This will be a strange review as I am in my 70s and bought this for protection in my house at the advice of police in our town for protection for those who don’t want guns. I love its light weight and fact it fits my hand. Bought another also to keep in bedroom. ( and I guess it would be able to have double duty for visiting grandchildren🤗)
customer_reviews.author: S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality! Lasted 10 months. Bent bat
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed . The bat lasted only 10 months and is now bent out of shape! Poor material and quality!
customer_reviews.author: UNIX Guru

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a fine bat. I've never had a quality issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a fine bat. I've never had a quality issue with Easton. But the bat I purchased is significantly heavier than claimed. I purchased the 29in/19 oz. version. It says so on the bat itself. When we received it, it felt heavy. We weighed it on my scientific scale and it weighed just shy of 22 oz. That's a large difference for little league. For comparison I weighed our other (older) Easton bats. All weighed exactly as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Bent Bat after half a season
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son. He used it for only a few games, hit a high right field foul. Went to bat again and noticed that the bat was bent just above the grip. He loved this bat, but now it is useless. Need to last a little longer than one short season. I have looked everywhere for a place to make a claim on here, didnt find anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: More like 28 inch
customer_reviews.text: Easton hasn't gotten their length/weight correct on the new USA bats. This bat was nearly 3 ounces heavier than labeled. More like 28 inch, 21 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level bat
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good bat for someone starting out playing baseball. Inexpensive for the brand, no dents yet, used spring and fall season. Got the bat for my son, but other guys on the team used it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavier then listed weight
customer_reviews.text: 27" bat is listed to weigh 17oz but we weighed it as 19.5 oz. Other then that it's a fine starter bat with a 2 1/4" barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Counselor4444

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The bar did not last long we noticed just hitting baseballs that the bat was curving. I called EA for warranty well nothing . I bought a AXE bat this season .
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully Amazon Prime is awesome about returns
customer_reviews.text: Bat was very heavy and awkward, weight not distributed well, much heavier than weight listed. My son is big and very strong for his age and he had a hard time getting this bat around quickly when swinging. Thankfully Amazon Prime is awesome about returns.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kids, very well made bat, definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Leo Torres

customer_reviews.title: As described, but HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: The bat is as described, with the correct stamp to be allowed in his league this summer, but it is REALLY heavy. Might be worth saving and putting the money towards a more expensive, but much lighter bat.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Good for coach pitch
customer_reviews.text: 7 yo coach pitch son digs this bat (it was orange so I’m sure that’s the biggest reason he likes it)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Gittus

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My boy used the bat a dozen times and his coach has informed me that its “dead”. Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USA stamp appropriate for Little League
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than promised to specs and performs well. USA stamp appropriate for Little League and the ounces suit my 9 year old grandson's height and swing. Definitely would recommend, the color is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Vincze

customer_reviews.title: Poor bat size chart
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase bat length according to the size chart displayed. Our son is over 4’ tall so we ordered a 30” bat. It was WAY to long and heavy for him. We had to return it and purchase another bat that was 27”. This seller was great though...easy return and reached out to see what was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: My son and love his new bat
customer_reviews.text: My son and love his new bat. He will get much use out of it. Arrived right on time :)
customer_reviews.author: marg

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: harmonizewithme

customer_reviews.title: this is a great price for a really good quality bat
customer_reviews.text: Home run hit here! Thank you so much, this is a great price for a really good quality bat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Karnas

customer_reviews.title: Bent bat
customer_reviews.text: Within a month the bat was bent from my son batting in youth baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy N

customer_reviews.title: All around great bat. Would of gave it 5 stars but ...
customer_reviews.text: All around great bat. Would of gave it 5 stars but the warranty paper stuck to the bat when opening and took some of the finish off.
customer_reviews.author: David Howard

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. This is my son’s 2nd Rawlings USA ...
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. This is my son’s 2nd Rawlings USA approved bat. These new bats bend with normal use. This will be the 2nd Rawlings USA approved bat we return. The second bat made it two weeks. Total use: 1 player, 3 practices and 4 games.
customer_reviews.author: G Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his new bat... actually getting hits with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my almost 5 foot 9 year old!
customer_reviews.author: kolirene

customer_reviews.title: Good bat, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The bat itself is fine, but warranty sheet stuck to it and removed some of the finish when I took it off. My son probably couldn't care less, but I thought I'd point it out for others who are a little obsessive about things looking shiny and new like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Brandilocks

customer_reviews.title: The bat in the pictures look like a normal shaped bats
customer_reviews.text: The bat in the pictures look like a normal shaped bats, but the one I got looks like a fungo. Long stick and small sweet spot. Unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Luis Betancourth

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy for kids works fine for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: ... son loves his new bat and it fits him perfect and he is now hitting a lot better
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bat and it fits him perfect and he is now hitting a lot better. Also it came really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Bent...
customer_reviews.text: Bat bent after 2 months after using by my 11yo son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons are excited for baseball season so they can use them..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure your child's arm length and bat correctly.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the bat, the only thing was that it was a couple inches too long.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya C. Nix-Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Go with this to start it’s perfect and I’m not crying.
customer_reviews.text: Good affordable starting bat. I could not imagine spending 200 on a bat, to watch my poorbaby boy swinging and missing this season. I don’t know much about baseball but I do know it can be way slow boring and expensive. When you lr kid start hitting the ball consistantly then go for broke but until then this is a good league approves bat.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift & he was thrilled....will use it this spring!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Giardenelli

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present and our 10 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: firewife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bat!
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this for Christmas. He loves it and has spent more time at the park playing baseball than ever!
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfDragons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful work of art this baseball bat...my grandson loved his gift immensely!
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: he loves it and it's held up fine so far (3 months so far)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid, he loves it and it's held up fine so far (3 months so far).
customer_reviews.author: Customer Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love that it was affordable for me
customer_reviews.text: My son has been enjoying everything about this bat, I love that it was affordable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat!
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice for the price and it feels so right swinging it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My son was very happy when he got his bat!! He love the color size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bat low price has USA stamp on it. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Erv Gotti

product_meta.title: Easton 2018 USA Baseball 2 1/4 S150 Youth Baseball Bat -10
product_meta.description: Lightweight, yet powerful. Easton speed Brigade S150 -10 USA bat is made from ALX50 military grade aluminum for high performance and dependable durability. The -10 balanced design, with a 2-1/4 inch barrel, has a fast swing weight for added power on contact, delivering the pop and performance you expect from Easton.
feature_bullets: Alx50 Military grade aluminum construction for extended durability
